name: The Holy Rod of Blackspawn (1h)
data: It has superb weapon class for its type (weak in general).
It increases the users wisdom a bit.
It decreases the users intelligence a bit.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'smash'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'bless'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'arcane lore'.
